data.actual_result: We can scroll down or up but if the took of our finger from the screen we can just swipe up the mini-profile.
data.expected_result: We can't scroll down or up.
data.short_description: If we stay our finger on the screen when opening the mini-profile, we can still screen.
data.steps_to_repro: - Open the mini-profile (keep your finger on your screen even when the mini-profile is open). - Try to scroll up or down.
